page.title: 01Finzean NE.
page.content: {The Quod Sacra Parish of Finzean covers a widespread area in the upper Feugh valley in the district of Deeside/Kincardine in the Grampian Region of Scotland.The NE section is intensively farmed with some forestry and rough grazing. There is an old water-powered meal mill,two houses over 200 years old, plenty of animal and bird and a lively community with young couples building their own homes tho' most must commute to work.A new sheltered housing scheme houses the elderly in contented security.Here and there is a holiday home or discreet caravan,signifying that visitors return again and again to enjoy the peace and serenity of this lovely valley.Up the hill are the Church and the school, the old school used as an Outdoor Centre.
